short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unleash speed and luxury with every new tab! Custom shortcuts, search, and exclusive Lamborghini Revuelto wallpapers await you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feel the thrill of the Lamborghini Revuelto Opera Unica every time you open a new tab! With a sleek and powerful Google search bar, your browsing becomes as smooth as cruising in a Revuelto. Popular site shortcuts are instantly accessible, and you can add custom shortcuts for a personalized experience as luxurious as a Lamborghini.

Each new tab brings a fresh Lamborghini Revuelto wallpaper, showcasing the iconic design and speed of this masterpiece. Enjoy 10 updated and exclusive backgrounds that capture the elegance and performance of this high-end vehicle, keeping your screen as dynamic as the car itself.

Whether youâ€™re a fan of speed, luxury, or just love beautiful design, this extension gives you fast access to your favorite websites and constantly evolving visuals that reflect the true essence of Lamborghini.

Turn your browser into a supercar experience and feel the adrenaline of the Lamborghini Revuelto Opera Unica with every click!
